vlive.korean: [거의 지진급] 책상 너무 흔들리는 거 아니야? [Like an earthquake] You're moving the desk back and forth. 듣기 View video Dispatch : [ⓓxV] “셉카소를 찾아라” ① (힙합팀 : SEVENTEEN)
vlive.english: [Like an earthquake] You're moving the desk back and forth.

vlive.korean: [동공 지진] 싫어하는 사람 한 명밖에 없죠? [His eyes are shaking] There's only one person who doesn't like it, right? 듣기 View video OSEN : NCT DREAM, 노는 것만 봐도 힐링이다 #스타로드 05
vlive.english: [His eyes are shaking] There's only one person who doesn't like it, right?

examples.korean: He was buried alive in the earthquake. 발음듣기 그는 그 지진으로 생매장되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was buried alive in the earthquake. 발음

examples.korean: The town was rocked by an earthquake. 발음듣기 그 도시는 지진으로 마구 뒤흔들렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The town was rocked by an earthquake. 발음

examples.korean: After the earthquake, the people set about rebuilding their homes. 발음듣기 지진이 끝난 후에 사람들은 집을 다시 짓기 시작했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: After the earthquake, the people set about rebuilding their homes. 발음

examples.korean: Whole villages were wiped out by the earthquake. 발음듣기 그 지진으로 마을들 전체가 완전히 파괴되어 버렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Whole villages were wiped out by the earthquake. 발음

examples.korean: Hundreds of people were rendered homeless by the earthquake. 발음듣기 수백 명의 사람들이 그 지진으로 집을 잃게 되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Hundreds of people were rendered homeless by the earthquake. 발음
